mapper.sql:
serialNum, contractSerial, supplyComId, buyComId, orderNum, orderType, seller, entrustParty, serviceModel, demandPlanSerial, saleApplySerial, settlementClause, orderSerial, deliveryMode, transportMode, orderDate, maker, rate, currency, exchangeRate, orderAmount, materielCount, materielAmount, rateAmount, rateAndAmount, otherAmount, remark, orderRemark,
status, delFlg, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from orderInfo
order by ${orderByClause}

select orderInfo.serialNum, orderInfo.contractSerial, orderInfo.supplyComId, orderInfo.buyComId, orderInfo.orderNum, orderInfo.orderType, orderInfo.seller, orderInfo.entrustParty, orderInfo.serviceModel, orderInfo.demandPlanSerial, orderInfo.saleApplySerial, orderInfo.settlementClause, orderInfo.orderSerial, orderInfo.deliveryMode, orderInfo.materielCount,orderInfo.orderAmount, orderInfo.transportMode, orderInfo.orderDate, orderInfo.maker, orderInfo.rate, orderInfo.currency, orderInfo.exchangeRate, orderInfo.remark,orderRemark, orderInfo.status, orderInfo.delFlg, orderInfo.creator, orderInfo.createTime, orderInfo.updater, orderInfo.updateTime from orderInfo left join contract on orderInfo.contractSerial = contract.serialNum where orderInfo.delFlg = 0
AND orderInfo.buyComId IS NULL
AND orderInfo.supplyComId IS NULL
AND contract.contractType = '框架合同' ORDER BY updateTime DESC

select orderInfo.serialNum, orderInfo.contractSerial, orderInfo.supplyComId, orderInfo.buyComId, orderInfo.orderNum, orderInfo.orderType, orderInfo.seller, orderInfo.entrustParty, orderInfo.serviceModel, orderInfo.demandPlanSerial, orderInfo.saleApplySerial, orderInfo.settlementClause, orderInfo.orderSerial, orderInfo.deliveryMode, orderInfo.materielCount,orderInfo.orderAmount, orderInfo.transportMode, orderInfo.orderDate, orderInfo.maker, orderInfo.rate, orderInfo.currency, orderInfo.exchangeRate, orderInfo.remark,orderInfo.orderRemark, orderInfo.status, orderInfo.delFlg, orderInfo.creator, orderInfo.createTime, orderInfo.updater, orderInfo.updateTime from orderInfo left join contract on orderInfo.contractSerial = contract.serialNum where orderInfo.delFlg = 0
AND orderInfo.buyComId IS NULL
AND orderInfo.supplyComId IS NULL
AND (contract.contractType is null or contract.contractType != '框架合同') ORDER BY updateTime DESC
mapper.insert: insert into orderInfo (serialNum, contractSerial, supplyComId, buyComId, orderNum, orderType, seller, entrustParty, serviceModel, demandPlanSerial, saleApplySerial, settlementClause, orderSerial, deliveryMode, transportMode, orderDate, maker, rate, currency, exchangeRate, materielCount, materielAmount, rateAmount, rateAndAmount, otherAmount, orderAmount, remark,orderRemark, status, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime) values (#{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyComId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyComId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrustParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{demandPlanSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleApplySerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlementClause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{maker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exchangeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materielCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materielAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rateAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rateAndAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
